## Overview

Welcome to Blueprints for React, a collection of 40+ components designed for documentation experiences. Whether you’re looking to extend a [Starter project](/starters/introduction/) or embarking on building a documentation site from scratch, our library is tailored to support your vision. It’s especially useful for projects that demand a high level of customization, allowing you to construct a documentation site that perfectly aligns with your project’s identity and requirements.
